column4: Who would like to recommend a WM for a slooow machine to me? I have looked at the following - xfce, seems the best choice, not super fast. icewm, super fast but too old school for my users. Fluxbox, didn't work. WindowMaker - way too confusing for my users. Any others worth a try?
crouton - no idea, I log in to fluxbox and it hangs, I have to restart X
if you use the amd64 arch, you're gonna have a lot of trouble playing closed format audio/video
